section.name: DataNucleus Training
section.p: DataNucleus is Open Source software. It is provided by a focussed team of highly experienced individuals to perform complex operations. While a company could deploy personnel to understand and extend DataNucleus themselves, it is often best to consult the experts in that software to maximise the benefits of its use. No other company can provide the training to the same level as we can.
DataNucleus provides on-site training focussing on the needs of customers staff. The backbone of DataNucleus training consists of:

ul.li: Best practices, scalability, performance tuning and capacity planning
Process Lifecycle : project planning, design and implementation

section.p: Cost : Please Contact Us for details.

ul.li: There is no guarantee of service availability. Training would only be available in a location convenient for ourselves, such as Europe. Training is not currently available in the USA.
DataNucleus experts are English, and Spanish speakers, however training material is only written in the English language.
Customers must provide the resources necessary and in a timely manner to enable the DataNucleus expert(s) to perform the engagement.
